price: (65) Abiding therein forever, they will not find a protector or a helper.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
